top_positive.title: Tories would maximise North Sea oil and gas extraction, Badenoch to say
top_positive.summary_llm: Tory leader Kemi Badenoch to announce plan to focus solely on "maximising extraction" Badench to formally announce the plan in a speech in Aberdeen on Tuesday . Reform UK has said it wants more fossil fuels extracted from the North Sea . Labour government has committed to banning new exploration licences .

top_positive.title: Finland's Prime Minister Sanna Marin concedes election
top_positive.summary_llm: Finland's Prime Minister Sanna Marin concedes defeat in parliamentary election . Opposition right-wing National Coalition Party claims victory in tightly fought contest . Pro-business NCP expected to win 48 of the 200 seats in parliament, narrowly ahead of the nationalist Finns Party . Marin, 37, the world’s youngest prime minister when she took office in 2019 .

top_positive.title: See the world's deepest fish
top_positive.summary_llm: A young snailfish has become the deepest fish ever filmed by scientists during a probe into the abyss of the northern Pacific Ocean . Scientists from University of Western Australia and Tokyo University of Marine Science and Technology released footage of the snailfish on Sunday . top_positive.title: First week 'critical' to avoid children missing school later, parents told
top_positive.summary_llm: Education Secretary Bridget Phillipson said schools and parents should "double down" to get children in at the start of the 2025 term . More than half (57%) of pupils who were partially absent in week one became "persistently absent" Overall, 18% of pupils were persistently absent in the 2024-25 school year, down from 23% in 2021-22 .

top_positive.title: The trade in US body parts that's completely legal - but ripe for exploitation
top_positive.summary_llm: For-profit body trade is effectively outlawed in the UK and other European countries . But looser regulation in the US has allowed the trade to flourish in the U.S. The largest investigation of its kind - conducted by Reuters journalist Brian Grow - has identified 25 for 25 forking companies in the trade .

top_negative.title: Former UN climate chief urges Australia to set ‘prosperity’ target of cutting emissions by 75% by 2035
top_negative.summary_llm: Former UN climate chief urges Australia to set ‘prosperity’ target of cutting emissions by 75% by 2035 . Christiana Figueres backs calls from a group of more than 350 businesses that it would be better for the economy than a lower goal . top_negative.title: US senators demand ‘massive surge’ of baby formula and aid to be sent to Gaza
top_negative.summary_llm: Group of five senators in letter to Marco Rubio call on US to use its ‘full power’ to help people facing starvation . More than 300 people, including at least 119 children, have died from hunger in Gaza since October 2023 . Israel announced on Friday it will no longer pause fighting to allow aid deliveries in Gaza City .

top_negative.title: New drug hailed as ‘gamechanger’ in tackling stubbornly high blood pressure
top_negative.summary_llm: New drug hailed as ‘gamechanger’ in tackling stubbornly high blood pressure . Trials of baxdrostat have produced ‘exciting’ results for people whose hypertension has proved difficult to control . The breakthrough has taken decades of research to achieve .
